description.value:
Your animal companion grows up, becoming a mature animal companion and gaining additional capabilities. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Hunt Prey]{Hunt Prey} action, your animal companion assaults the prey even without your orders.

During an encounter, even if you don't use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Command an Animal]{Command an Animal} action, your animal companion can still use 1 action that round on your turn to Stride toward or Strike your prey.
